content: Did anyone already figure out how the "digest" feature works? in the settings you can chose to "receive digest emails while you're away" I haven't been away since I joined, so no idea what that feature does... I presume ist sends out a digest of all messages of all streams you subscribed to. But in what intervals? Daily?

I wonder if this feature could be potentially abused to send a daily digest of all activities in the "german"-stream out to subscribers of a mailing list, to keep those informed who are interested in FHIR but chose not to be actively involved in the zulip discussions...
I don't think we've actually turned on the daily digest e-mailer. I can test it :-)
